topic: Celebrity Big Brother (British TV series) series 24
summary: Celebrity Big Brother's 24th series, the first on ITV after a five-year hiatus, aired in March 2024. Hosted by AJ Odudu and Will Best, the series featured a mix of celebrities from various fields, including actors, reality stars, and even a royal. Notable housemates included Sharon Osbourne (as a 'lodger'), Louis Walsh, Zeze Millz, and David Potts. The series was marked by dramatic confrontations, unexpected alliances, and emotional moments as the celebrities navigated life under constant surveillance. Arguments flared over trivial matters and deeper-seated issues, leading to heated debates. The public ultimately voted for David Potts as the winner, making him the first winner of the show on ITV. The series proved to be a ratings success, reigniting interest in the Celebrity Big Brother format and generating significant media buzz.
